languages.text: "Даровать ему легкую смерть? После всего, что он сделал? После того, как стольких наших обрек на смерть во имя богомерзких услад ксеносов?!" {n}Комиссар голосит на все логово.{/n} "Даруем ли мы этому отродью легкую смерть?! Нет! Нет! Нет!"

"You suggest that we let him die? After all that he has done? After he condemned so many of our own to a death for the ungodly pleasures of xenos?" {n}The Commissar's fervent shouting permeates the den.{/n} "Will we grant this vicious spawn an easy death? Never! Never! Never!"
languages.original_text: "Даровать ему легкую смерть? После всего, что он сделал? После того, как стольких наших обрек на смерть во имя богомерзких услад ксеносов?!" {n}Комиссар голосит на все логово.{/n} "Даруем ли мы этому отродью легкую смерть?! Нет! Нет! Нет!"

traits.locale_text: "Grant him an easy death? After all that he's done? After he's condemned so many of our own to a death for the ungodly pleasures of xenos?" {n}Commissar's fervent shouting permeates the den.{/n} "Will we grant this spawn an easy death? Never! Never! Never!"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

traits.locale_text: "Grant him an easy death? After all that he's done? After he's condemned so many of our own to a death for the ungodly pleasures of xenos?" {n}Commissar's fervent shouting permeates the den.{/n} "Will we grant this spawn an easy death? Never! Never! Never!"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

traits.locale_text: "You suggest that we let him die? After all that he has done? After he condemned so many of our own to a death for the ungodly pleasures of xenos?" {n}The Commissar's fervent shouting permeates the den.{/n} "Will we grant this vicious spawn an easy death? Never! Never! Never!"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: “你是说，我们应该杀了他？他为了异形邪恶的娱乐，害死了我们之中那么多人，你打算就让他也一死了之？”{n}政委狂热的喊声弥漫在整个巢穴中。{/n}“这个恶毒的家伙，我们真的要给他个痛快吗？不！绝不！想都别想！”
languages.original_text: "You suggest that we let him die? After all that he has done? After he condemned so many of our own to a death for the ungodly pleasures of xenos?" {n}The Commissar's fervent shouting permeates the den.{/n} "Will we grant this vicious spawn an easy death? Never! Never! Never!"

traits.locale_text: “你是说，我们应该杀了他？他为了异形邪恶的娱乐，害死了我们之中那么多人，你打算就让他也一死了之？”{n}政委狂热的喊声弥漫在整个巢穴中。{/n}“这个恶毒的家伙，我们真的要给他个痛快吗？不！绝不！想都别想！”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: 「あれほどの仕打ちをしたのに、大人しく死ぬのを見守れと？異種族の邪悪な快楽のために、多くの同胞を死に追いやったというのに？」{n}コミッサーの熱狂的な叫び声が巣穴中に響き渡る。{/n}「この悪党を楽に死なせろと？ありえない！それだけは絶対に無理だ！」
languages.original_text: "You suggest that we let him die? After all that he has done? After he condemned so many of our own to a death for the ungodly pleasures of xenos?" {n}The Commissar's fervent shouting permeates the den.{/n} "Will we grant this vicious spawn an easy death? Never! Never! Never!"

traits.locale_text: 「あれほどの仕打ちをしたのに、大人しく死ぬのを見守れと？異種族の邪悪な快楽のために、多くの同胞を死に追いやったというのに？」{n}コミッサーの熱狂的な叫び声が巣穴中に響き渡る。{/n}「この悪党を楽に死なせろと？ありえない！それだけは絶対に無理だ！」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «¿Está sugiriendo que le dejemos morir? ¿Después de todo lo que ha hecho? ¿Después de condenar a muerte a tantos de los nuestros para el vil disfrute de los xenos?». {n}Los gritos fervientes del Comisario cubren la zona.{/n} «¿Otorgaremos a esta repugnante criatura una muerte fácil? ¡Nunca! ¡Nunca! ¡Nunca!».
languages.original_text: "You suggest that we let him die? After all that he has done? After he condemned so many of our own to a death for the ungodly pleasures of xenos?" {n}The Commissar's fervent shouting permeates the den.{/n} "Will we grant this vicious spawn an easy death? Never! Never! Never!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Está sugiriendo que le dejemos morir? ¿Después de todo lo que ha hecho? ¿Después de condenar a muerte a tantos de los nuestros para el vil disfrute de los xenos?». {n}Los gritos fervientes del Comisario cubren la zona.{/n} «¿Otorgaremos a esta repugnante criatura una muerte fácil? ¡Nunca! ¡Nunca! ¡Nunca!».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: "You suggest that we let him die? After all that he has done? After he condemned so many of our own to a death for the ungodly pleasures of xenos?" {n}The Commissar's fervent shouting permeates the den.{/n} "Will we grant this vicious spawn an easy death? Never! Never! Never!"

languages.text: « Vous voudriez qu'on le laisse mourir ? Après tout ce qu'il a fait ? Après qu'il a condamné tant des nôtres à mourir pour le plaisir des xénos ? » {n}La voix tonitruante du commissaire résonne dans le repaire.{/n} « Accorderons-nous une mort rapide à ce rejeton de l'enfer ? Jamais ! Jamais ! Jamais ! »
languages.original_text: "You suggest that we let him die? After all that he has done? After he condemned so many of our own to a death for the ungodly pleasures of xenos?" {n}The Commissar's fervent shouting permeates the den.{/n} "Will we grant this vicious spawn an easy death? Never! Never! Never!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous voudriez qu'on le laisse mourir ? Après tout ce qu'il a fait ? Après qu'il a condamné tant des nôtres à mourir pour le plaisir des xénos ? » {n}La voix tonitruante du commissaire résonne dans le repaire.{/n} « Accorderons-nous une mort rapide à ce rejeton de l'enfer ? Jamais ! Jamais ! Jamais ! »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Ihr schlagt vor, ihn sterben zu lassen? Nach allem, was er getan hat? Nachdem er so viele von uns für die gottlosen Freuden der Xenos zum Tod verurteilt hat?" {n}Die laute Stimme des Kommissars hallt durch den Unterschlupf.{/n} "Werden wir dieser bösen Brut einen schnellen Tod gewähren? Niemals! Niemals! Niemals!"
languages.original_text: "You suggest that we let him die? After all that he has done? After he condemned so many of our own to a death for the ungodly pleasures of xenos?" {n}The Commissar's fervent shouting permeates the den.{/n} "Will we grant this vicious spawn an easy death? Never! Never! Never!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr schlagt vor, ihn sterben zu lassen? Nach allem, was er getan hat? Nachdem er so viele von uns für die gottlosen Freuden der Xenos zum Tod verurteilt hat?" {n}Die laute Stimme des Kommissars hallt durch den Unterschlupf.{/n} "Werden wir dieser bösen Brut einen schnellen Tod gewähren? Niemals! Niemals! Niemals!"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Onu öldürmemizi mi öneriyorsun? Bütün yaptıklarından, sayısız insanımızı zenoların din dışı zevkleri için ölüme mahkûm ettikten sonra mı?" {n}Komiser'in hararetli bağırışları, tüm ine yayılıyor.{/n} "Bu iğrenç yaratığa kolay bir ölüm mü bahşedeceğiz? Asla! Asla! Asla!"
languages.original_text: "You suggest that we let him die? After all that he has done? After he condemned so many of our own to a death for the ungodly pleasures of xenos?" {n}The Commissar's fervent shouting permeates the den.{/n} "Will we grant this vicious spawn an easy death? Never! Never! Never!"

traits.locale_text: "Onu öldürmemizi mi öneriyorsun? Bütün yaptıklarından sonra? Türümüzden sayısız kişiyi zenoların din dışı zevkleri için ölüme mahkûm ettikten sonra?" {n}Komiser'in hararetli bağırışları tüm ine yayılıyor.{/n} "Bu iğrenç yaratığa kolay bir ölüm mü bahşedeceğiz? Asla! Asla! Asla!"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
